name: Bacterial Leaf Blight
description: Bacterial disease caused by Xanthomonas oryzae pv. oryzae, causing water-soaked lesions on leaves that turn yellow and die.

solutions.title: Copper-Based Bactericide
solutions.description: Spray Copper Oxychloride (0.3%) or Streptomycin (0.05%) immediately upon detection

solutions.title: Remove Infected Leaves
solutions.description: Prune and destroy infected leaves to reduce bacterial inoculum and prevent spread

solutions.title: Water Management
solutions.description: Avoid overhead irrigation and reduce water splashing between plants. Maintain proper drainage.

solutions.title: Field Sanitation
solutions.description: Remove weeds and maintain clean field borders. Practice crop rotation with non-host crops.

prevention: Avoid wounding plants during field operations
Practice crop rotation with non-host crops

name: Brown Spot
description: A fungal disease caused by Bipolaris oryzae that affects rice leaves, causing brown spots and reducing yield.

solutions.title: Remove Infected Plants
solutions.description: Remove and destroy severely infected plants to prevent spread

solutions.title: Apply Fungicide
solutions.description: Spray with Propiconazole (0.1%) or Mancozeb (0.2%) at 10-15 day intervals

solutions.title: Improve Field Drainage
solutions.description: Ensure proper water management and avoid waterlogging

solutions.title: Use Resistant Varieties
solutions.description: Plant resistant varieties like IR64, IR72 in next season

name: Leaf Blast
description: A devastating fungal disease caused by Magnaporthe oryzae, affecting leaves with diamond-shaped lesions that can spread to nodes and panicles.

solutions.title: Immediate Fungicide Treatment
solutions.description: Apply Tricyclazole (0.06%) or Isoprothiolane (0.1%) immediately. Alternative: Kasugamycin (20g/l SL) at 15ml/10L, repeat every 5-10 days.

solutions.title: Remove Infected Parts
solutions.description: Cut and burn infected leaves and panicles to prevent further spread

solutions.title: Adjust Water Management
solutions.description: Maintain shallow water level (5-7 cm) and avoid drought stress

solutions.title: Post-Harvest Management
solutions.description: Destroy crop residues and practice deep plowing after harvest

prevention: Early planting to avoid peak disease period
